name: CMPAN: AMBUSH IN TAMBUN TULANG
description:
Cindua Mato is a twist version of minangkabau tribe of Indonesia's folklore by the same title. Set in a post apocalyptic world torn by nuclear war, human is stateless, avoiding survive nature wrath, back to surviving within colonies. With Gumarang - the ancient tech bionic horse, and Binuang - the mutated Buffalo Cindua mato is set on a journey on behalf of his half brother the King Dang Tuanku.

CMPAN is for Cindua Mato Panel.
This is a panel of a graphic novel titled "Cindua Mato" (in progress). It is to be published once reached 4 chapter. but in the meantime you can invest on the panels before it price went up once it published ;)

JPEG 5000x3500 px
Based on the Novel "Cindua Mato" by Tito Alexi
Illustrated By Yudhi Darmawan collaborated with AI
Minang Creative Association - 2021
